Module overrungl.nfd
Package overrungl.nfd

Class NFDU8FilterItem

java.lang.Object
overrungl.Pointer
overrungl.Struct
overrungl.nfd.NFDU8FilterItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Addressable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NFDU8FilterItem.Buffer
public class NFDU8FilterItem extends Struct
NFDU8FilterItem relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • NFDU8FilterItem refers to one or more preview APIs: MemoryLayout, MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator, StructLayout.
Programs can only use NFDU8FilterItem when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.

Layout


 struct nfdu8filteritem_t {
     const nfdu8char_t* name;
     const nfdu8char_t* spec;
 }

0.1.0

squid233
